attributes.action: Get Vauxhall to sort out the piston 4 issue with Vauxhall Corsa vxr’s
attributes.background: The Vauxhall Corsa VXR has an issue where the 4th piston breaks in the engine and can cause £1000’s in damage repairs. Some of these cars can be last 80,000 miles and over but some have gone as low as 12,000

rejection.details: You can find out how to make a complaint to the motor ombudsman here: https://www.themotorombudsman.org/consumers/make-a-complaint
